ResourceHeader.ResourceName: DE 1 Plasma Waves Instrument (PWI) DC electric field data
ResourceHeader.AlternateName: Dynamics Explorer 1 PWI DC electric field data
DE-A PWI DC electric field data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Plasma Waves Instrument DC electric field data

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog on the Plasma Wave Instrument
InformationURL.Description: Introduction to the Plasma Wave Instrument on DE1

AccessURL.Name: Plasma Waves Instrument DC electric field data
AccessURL.Description: This URL contains the DE1 PWI DC electric field Data

NumericalData.ProviderResourceName: Plasma Waves Instrument DC electric field

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: milliseconds of the day

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Universal Time columns from left to right are: yeardoy msec in the format of yyddd msec.

Structure.Description: Universal Time expressed using a 6-column day, month, year, hour, minute, second representation

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field in the perpendicular direction
Parameter.ParameterKey: PWI DC electric field in the perpendicular direction
Parameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. The component of the electric field measured in the spin plane that is perpendicular to the projection of the local magnetic field on the spin plane, expressed in volts/meter.

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field in the parallel direction
Parameter.ParameterKey: PWI DC electric field in the parallel direction
Parameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. The component of the electric field measured in the spin plane that is parallel to the projection of the local magnetic field on the spin plane, expressed in volts/meter.

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field Quality
Parameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. An indication of the quality of the data taken with the Ex antenna. A value of -1.0 indicates that the corresponding EPAR and EPER could not be determined.

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field in the EZ atenna direction
Parameter.ParameterKey: PWI DC electric field in the EZ atenna direction
Parameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. The average electric field measured by the Ez antenna, expressed in volts/meter.

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field EZ Quality
Parameter.ParameterKey: PWI DC electric field EZ Quality
Parameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. The standard deviation of the electric field measured by the Ez antenna. A value of -1.0 indicates that the corresponding EZAVE could not be determined.

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument Dummy Value
Parameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. Dummy Value

Parameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field antenna
Parameter.ParameterKey: PWI DC electric field Antenna used for measurement
Parameter.Description: PWI DC electric field Antenna used for measurement: EX or EZ or ES or B

Parameter.Name: DE1 spacecraft position vector inerpolated to 1 sec resolution
Parameter.Description: Location of the spacecraft in magnetic coordinates in units of Re, Re, local time, and latitude
